marketing.name: Marketing Department
marketing.description: The Marketing Department is the avatar of FinTech Club RMIT Vietnam when in charge of managing social networking sites (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn) as well as writing content and designing images for posts. Besides, they plan and execute marketing campaigns for projects. This is a place for members to practice, learn skills in FinTech, and marketing, share experiences and stories in life and create wonderful memories with each other.
